basics.name: Emma Trzupek
basics.summary: CS and game design student @ USC Viterbi, looking to make media that brings people together.

awards.title: Trustee Scholarship
awards.summary: USC faculty and staff select the recipients of this scholarship from an extremely competitive group of freshman applicants (100 out of 80,000). The award covers full tuition.

highlights: Produce games for Annenberg's media website with over 15,000 users
Improve game experiences through community feedback and weekly user playtesting
Train other team members in game development fundamentals and code quality principles
Update and maintain the organization's Squarespace website
Plan and lead monthly book discussion meetings for the club's 500 members
Communicate with members about book polls and social events through weekly email newsletter
Organize E-Board meetings and take detailed minutes of important information

projects.name: USC Crossy Road
highlights: First time working with a game engine
Cultivated skills in team management and leadership

work.name: Winding Trails Summer Day Camp
highlights: Create and lead multiple daily activities for the unit's 150 campers (ages 7 through 9)
Mentor new staff member and present actionable feedback through mid-summer evaluation
Maintain relationships between camper parent/guardians through bi-weekly check-in phone calls

work.name: Winding Trails Summer Day Camp
highlights: Adapted to different groups every day, filling in for permanent staff in a variety of roles
Interacted with over 300 different campers (ages 5 through 10) each summer
Planned and led group bonding activities during free time and rainy days
